column2: mutate(race_eth = factor(race_eth, levels = c("American Indian or Alaskan Native", "Asian", "Black or African American", "Filipino", "Hispanic", "Multiracial", "Native Hawaiian/Pacific Islander", "White", "Unknown", "Unreported"))) %>%
ggplot(aes(x = race_eth, y = percent, fill = group)) +
x = NULL, y = NULL, fill = NULL)
